thread.title: Alway NYC, Always the Surrey
thread.title_full: Alway NYC, Always the Surrey - Review of The Surrey, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: jboyle85
title: Alway NYC, Always the Surrey
text: We make it to NYC at least once every season and love the Surrey - not inexpensive (it's Manhattan!) but the staff makes you feel like you own the joint. The rooms, while in need of a minor cosmetic refresh since the renovation 5 or 6 years ago, are extremely comfortable (especially ultra 1-bdrm suites) and luxurious. It feels hip, but not pretentious, and we would not stay anywhere else.
